body.p: NDoc generates class libraries documentation from .NET assemblies and the XML documentation files generated by the C# compiler (or an add-on tool for VB.NET).

NDoc uses add-on documenters to generate documentation in several different formats, including the MSDN-style HTML Help format (.chm), the Visual Studio .NET Help format (HTML Help 2), and
MSDN-online style web pages.

The NDoc source code is freely available under a certified
Open Source license. We welcome everyone to use our software in the hopes that they can provide feedback, submit bug reports and fixes, or even join us as a developer!
